Name: Bloodland
About the game: Bloodland is an online multiplayer combat game, based around magic and spell-casting. Join a team, choose your role, and customize your character's attributes to lead your team to victory. Battle across different landscapes in online matchmaking. Bloodland is cross-platform enabled and you can access your account from mobile devices as well as PC. This game is a PVP only game, so broadband internet connection is required. Advance in the game by completing challenges, slaying enemies, and collecting currency drops that can be spent on new gear and aesthetic items. Track your battle statistics and challenge progress in between battles. Join the same battles as friends by browsing active battles. Bloodland is a solo-developer game being created as a passion project to gain experience in programming and online networking.
